/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the typical weather conditions in Beijing.
